# pengen

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of pengen is to provide an extensible framework for 
prototyping penalized, generalized linear models.

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jolars/pengen")
```
